name: Deathless
aura: Increases Ally RES in Arena Battles by 70.

skills.desc:
Attacks 1 enemy. Has a 70% chance of placing a 60% [Decrease DEF] debuff for 2 turns if 1 or more allies are dead, a 30% [Decrease SPD] debuff for 2 turns if 2 or more allies are dead, and a 50% [Decrease ACC] debuff for 2 turns if 3 or more allies are dead.

Damage inflicted is proportional to DEF.
skills.name: Grave Whispers
skills.books:
Level 2: Damage +5%
Level 3: Damage +5%
Level 4: Buff/Debuff Chance +10%
Level 5: Buff/Debuff Chance +10%
Level 6: Buff/Debuff Chance +10%

skills.desc: Places a 30% [Reflect Damage] buff on this Champion for 2 turns, then attacks 1 enemy. Has an 80% chance of placing a [Provoke] debuff for 1 turn.

Level 5: Buff/Debuff Chance +10%

skills.desc: Attacks all enemies. This attack will always be critical if there are 2 or more dead allies. Damage increases according to the number of dead allies.
